code: import React from"react";import"./style.css";import Header from"../Header/Header";import Category from"../Category/Category";import Footer from"../Footer/Footer";import{useParams,useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Card,CardImg,CardBody,CardTitle,CardSubtitle,Badge}from"reactstrap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Index(){var products=useSelector(function(state){return state.products;});var _useParams=useParams(),search=_useParams.search;var history=useHistory();var filterCategory=products.filter(function(item){return item.title.toLowerCase()===search.toLowerCase();});var routeHandler=function routeHandler(item){history.replace("/products/".concat(item.title,"/").concat(item.productId),{product:item});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Category,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid mx-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-dark ml-2",children:"Based On Your Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row productRow",children:filterCategory.map(function(item,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-3 col-md-6 col-sm-6",onClick:function onClick(){return routeHandler(item);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[item.condition==="New"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{color:"warning",className:"product__badge text-uppercase",children:"Featured"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardImg,{className:"CardImg",top:true,width:"100%",src:item.images[0],alt:"Card image cap"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{className:"product__cardbody",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardSubtitle,{children:item.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardSubtitle,{children:item.category})]})]})},i);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}export default Index;
